front.title: Design Considerations for Name Resolution Service in ICN

abstract.t: This document provides the functionalities and design considerations for a Name Resolution Service (NRS) in ICN. An NRS in ICN is to translate an object name into some other information such as a locator, another name, etc. for forwarding the object request. This document is a product of the Information-Centric Networking Research Group (ICNRG).
